name: Familiar (ursagames, πthon)
description:
Find your lost cats and use their magical abilities to fight spooky enemies! 

Made with Unity in the span of 35 hours.

Designed for Mouse + Keyboard or Xbox 360 controller.

WASD / Arrow keys to move and jump, mouse to aim and attack / throw.

Left joystick to move, A to jump, X to attack, right joystick to throw.

Artwork and Character Design by tothegoogleplex

Music and SFX by サオエ！！

Programming by ursagames
